description:
Levy Konigsberg LLP is proud to provide unparalleled legal services to victims of asbestos exposure and mesothelioma and their families. With offices in Lawrence Township, New Jersey, and throughout the country, we dedicate the full force of our resources to securing justice for our clients.

We are a nationally acclaimed law firm with a special focus on asbestos and mesothelioma law, and we handle cases involving lead paint poisoning, pharmaceutical product liability, medical malpractice and whistleblowers.

For over 30 years, our clients and peers have recognized us for our dedicated and successful legal counsel.

A Reputation You Can Trust

If you or your loved one is suffering due to an asbestos-related cancer, we are prepared to fight relentlessly on your behalf for the compensation you deserve.

Since we became pioneers in asbestos and mesothelioma litigation decades ago, we have won hundreds of millions of dollars for our clients — including individual verdicts exceeding $10 million. Our wins include landmark cases expanding the rights of plaintiffs to  sue asbestos companies for damages.

The contributions we have made in this field of law have been recognized in many forms. In 2013, U.S. News & World Report and Best Lawyers named Levy Konigsberg LLP “Law Firm of the Year” in plaintiff’s product liability litigation. Several lawyers at our firm are rated AV Preeminent,* by Martindale-Hubbell. This is the service's highest rating. Additionally, year after year our attorneys are included in New York Super Lawyers and Best Lawyers**

Unlike many other law firms, we do not refer out complex asbestos litigation. Our lawyers and legal staff are proud to handle asbestos and mesothelioma cases at all stages, and provide clients with superior service.

To learn how we can help you, please contact us and schedule a free initial consultation. We can meet with you at your home or hospital anywhere in the U.S. We represent clients on a contingency fee basis, which means that you are not responsible for legal fees unless we win your case.

*AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.

**The Best Lawyers in America 2013. Copyright 2012 by Woodward/White, Inc., Aiken, SC
